Name: Gray Death Legion
Description: The Gray Death Legion is the elite mercenary unit of military mastermind Grayson Death Carlyle. Starting as an offshoot of the Trellwan Lancers, an ad hoc militia unit set up by Carlyle for the defense of Trell I in 3024, the unit eventually grew to regimental size. Currently the Legion is under contract to the Lyran Commonwealth and under the command of Colonel Lori Kalmar-Carlyle, Grayson's wife.
